attributes.action: Request a change in the logo for the 2012 London Olympics
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The new logo is truly dreadful, uninspiring, dull, dry and bland (if not downrite unpleasand to look at). The organising committee want the public to be inspired by the logo (other than to vomit) for example to join in the spirit of the games, but why didn't they ask the public to submit logos. Big faux pas Seb - go back to the drawing board PS we loved the previous logo

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
